name: Startpage - Dark
description: by grom. Dark style for startpage.com, ixquick.com and ixquick-proxy.com (Ixquick Proxy / Startpage Proxy).
additional_info: Changelog: 2015-02-28 - big update for the upcoming redesign, see https://new.startpage.com/ and https://new.ixquick.com/ 2015-02-04 - my dev version differed from the posted one, so I updated; not sure what got fixed, other than the small bright box on the "nothing found" page. 2014-11-24 - added compatibility with Firefox add-on Web of Trust, per request. 2014-01-28 - compacted results page a little, result count dimmed, some comments added etc. 2014-01-22 - changed multiple backgrounds and colors; different search image (magnifying glass); various other tweaks.

discussions.name: WOT icons and popup with Startpage - Dark theme
Doesn't work anymore. Good theme idea btw.
